paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: No variants in the TTR gene were mentioned in the provided text.

tables_processed.table_caption: iROP infants included in GWAS analysis.
Association variants identified for all ROP samples with p < 5 × 10-6.
Lead SNP rs2058019 demonstrates association with severe ROP disease in Hispanic and European Ancestry populations but not in African American populations.
Cross-significance of top SNPs for retinal pathology characterized by pre-retinal neovascular disease including ROP and diabetic retinopathy (GOLDR).
Association tests using genetic risk score (GRS) method.
Extension of CRVE/CRAE significant loci to iROP dataset.
Association of SNPs identified with severe ROP.
Top-gene RNA-sequencing-based expression in human donor macular retinal or RPE/choroid tissue isolated using the Utah Protocol.

challenges: No TTR gene variants were mentioned in the text.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper focused on genetic associations with ROP, primarily involving other genes such as GLI3, but did not mention any variants in the TTR gene.
